data.actual_result: When u hit a pulsing one and then connected one, the connected will pulse one time
data.short_description: [Android] Avatar of connected member pulses like it is called
data.steps_to_repro: - Move to dm group with at least 3 members, where u are in call with sbdy - Move to "ongoing call-1 connected" from ur android device - Choose Ring option on RMB on 3rd member from pc - His pulsing avatar appears in "ongong call" - Start taping both avatars in "ongoing call" on android
